DESCRIPTION.P: Matlab and Scilab transposition behave differently in some particular cases:

ITEM.SP: With character strings operands: The ' operator is used to transpose whole character strings in Scilab while Matlab realizes the transposition of each character.

DESCRIPTION.P: The function mtlb_t(A) is used by mfile2sci to replace A' when it was not possible to know what were the operands while porting Matlab code to Scilab. This function will determine the correct semantic at run time. If you want to have a more efficient code it is possible to replace mtlb_t calls:

ITEM.SP: If A is not a character string matrix mtlb_t(A) may be replaced by A'

DESCRIPTION.P: Caution: mtlb_t has not to be used for hand coded functions.
